name: Olivia
comment: Titanic is a timeless classic that never fails to captivate audiences. The movie has a beautiful love story, stunning visuals, and great performances from the cast. A must-watch for anyone who loves romance or drama.

name: John
comment: Titanic is a cinematic masterpiece that tells a tragic and unforgettable story. The movie has great visuals, music, and acting, and it will leave you with a heavy heart. A must-watch for anyone who appreciates great filmmaking.
